title: How to Make Oven Steamed Rice in Vegetable Stock

steps.headline: Place the washed rice into the ovenproof dish.
Add 2 cups of boiling water and the salt or instant vegetable stock.
Cover the dish with a lid or kitchen foil.
Place the dish into the oven.
steps.description: Cook for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender.

text: Preheat the oven to 180ºC/350ºF.  Place the washed rice into the ovenproof dish.  Add 2 cups of boiling water and the salt or instant vegetable stock.  Cover the dish with a lid or kitchen foil.  Place the dish into the oven. Cook for 30-40 minutes or until the rice is tender. Remove from the oven. Serve immediately.
